sn56.44:1.2: ‘aham dukkham ariyasaccam yathabhutam anabhisamecca …pe… dukkhanirodhagaminim patipadam ariyasaccam yathabhutam anabhisamecca samma dukkhassantam karissami’ti—
sn56.44:2.2: ‘aham kutagarassa hetthimam gharam akaritva uparimam gharam aropessami’ti—
sn56.44:2.4: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yo evam vadeyya:
sn56.44:2.5: ‘aham dukkham ariyasaccam yathabhutam anabhisamecca …pe… dukkhanirodhagaminim patipadam ariyasaccam yathabhutam anabhisamecca samma dukkhassantam karissami’ti—
sn56.44:3.1: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, evam vadeyya:
sn56.44:3.2: ‘aham dukkham ariyasaccam yathabhutam abhisamecca …pe… dukkhanirodhagaminim patipadam ariyasaccam yathabhutam abhisamecca samma dukkhassantam karissami’ti—
sn56.44:4.2: ‘aham kutagarassa hetthimam gharam karitva uparimam gharam aropessami’ti—
sn56.44:4.4: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yo evam vadeyya:
sn56.44:4.5: ‘aham dukkham ariyasaccam yathabhutam abhisamecca …pe… dukkhanirodhagaminim patipadam ariyasaccam yathabhutam abhisamecca samma dukkhassantam karissami’ti—
sn56.44:5.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, ‘idam dukkhan’ti yogo karaniyo …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yogo karaniyo”ti.
